channel.title: Code Line Daily
channel.description: A line of code of the day.

item.title: myArray.entries()
item.description: Returns a new Array Iterator object that contains the key/value pairs for each index in the array.

item.title: myVar.length
item.description: Returns the number of elements in that array.

item.title: myVar.split(' ');
item.description: Splits string into array elements by spaces.

item.title: myVar.join(' ');
item.description: Returns a new string by concatenating array items with spaces.

item.title: uneval(myObj)
item.description: Creates a string representation of the source code of an Object. Use at your own risk.

item.title: eval(myExp)
item.description: Evaluates JavaScript code represented as a string. Use at your own risk.

item.title: decodeURI(myVar)
item.description: Returns decoded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) string.

item.title: decodeURIComponent(myVar)
item.description: Returns decoded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) component string.

item.title: encodeURI(myVar)
item.description: Returns encoded URI string.

item.title: encodeURIComponent(myVar)
item.description: Returns encoded URI component string.

item.title: Number.isNaN(myVar)
item.description: ECMAScript 2015 version for checking if a value is NaN or not.

item.title: isNaN(myVar)
item.description: Checks if a value is NaN or not.

item.title: Math.ceil()
item.description: Returns rounded number up to the next largest whole number or integer.

item.title: Math.floor()
item.description: Returns the largest integer less than or equal to a given number.

item.title: Math.max()
item.description: Returns the largest of zero or more numbers.

item.title: Math.min()
item.description: Returns the lowest of zero or more numbers.

item.title: Math.round()
item.description: Returns the value of a number rounded to the nearest integer.

item.title: Math.trunc()
item.description: Returns the integer part of a number by removing any fractional digits.

item.title: Math.pow()
item.description: Returns the base to the exponent power.

item.title: Math.sqrt()
item.description: Returns the square root of a number.

item.title: Math.random()
item.description: Returns a floating-point random number in the range 0–1.

item.title: <link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" title="RSS Feed" href="/rss">
item.description: Points to RSS feed and helps people and machines find the feed.

item.title: <meta charset="UTF-8">
item.description: Sets UTF-8 character encoding.

item.title: <meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer">
item.description: Omits the Referrer header entirely.

item.title: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
item.description: Controls the viewport's size and scale.

item.title: <!DOCTYPE html>
item.description: Sets doctype declaration to make browsers parse the document equally.

item.title: span:not(:only-child) {}
item.description: Targets all span elements that are the only child.

item.title: span:not(:first-of-type) {}
item.description: Targets all span elements that are not first child and type span.

item.title: span:not(:first-child) {}
item.description: Targets all span elements that are not first child.

item.title: span:not(:last-of-type) {}
item.description: Targets all span elements that are not last child and type span.

item.title: span:not(:last-child) {}
item.description: Targets all span elements that are not last child.

item.title: {{ 1999 | money }}
item.description: Converts a number variable into money format.

item.title: {{ myVar | json }}
item.description: Converts a string variable into JSON format.

item.title: forloop.last
item.description: Checks if it is the last iteration of the loop.

item.title: myArray.unshift(myElem)
item.description: Adds new elements to the beginning of an array. Returns a new array length.

item.title: myArray.shift()
item.description: Gets and removes the first element from an array.

item.title: myArray.pop()
item.description: Gets and removes the last element from an array.

item.title: myArray.push(myElem)
item.description: Adds new elements to the end of an array. Returns a new array length.

item.title: $myElem.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true')
item.description: Sets aria-hidden attribute to true.

item.title: $myElem.getAttribute('aria-hidden')
item.description: Gets aria-hidden attribute from the element.

item.title: window.innerWidth
item.description: Returns viewport's width in pixels.

item.title: window.innerHeight
item.description: Returns viewport's height in pixels.

item.title: window.scrollX
item.description: Returns the number of pixels that the document is currently scrolled horizontally.

item.title: window.scrollY
item.description: Returns the number of pixels that the document is currently scrolled vertically.

item.title: $myElem.getBoundingClientRect()
item.description: Returns the size of an element and its position relative to the viewport.

item.title: document.body
item.description: Returns the body of the body or frameset node of the current document.

item.title: wp_get_upload_dir()
item.description: Returns WordPress uploads directory information.

item.title: get_template_directory_uri()
item.description: Returns the WordPress theme directory URI.

item.title: get_template_directory()
item.description: Returns the WordPress current theme directory.

item.title: window.requestAnimationFrame(() => {...})
item.description: Tells the browser that you wish to perform an animation and requests that the browser calls a specified function to update an animation before the next repaint.

item.title: window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {...})
item.description: Sets scroll event listener.

item.title: link:only-child
item.description: Targets link element without any siblings.

item.title: link:first-of-type
item.description: Targets the first link element of its own type among group of siblings.

item.title: link:first-child
item.description: Targets the first link element among group of siblings.

item.title: link:last-of-type
item.description: Targets the last link element of its own type among group of siblings.

item.title: link:last-child
item.description: Targets the last link element among group of siblings.

item.title: link:empty
item.description: Targets empty link elements.

item.title: input::placeholder
item.description: Targets an input's placeholder.

item.title: visibility: hidden
item.description: Hides an element without changing the layout of a document.

item.title: @media (hover: hover) { ... }
item.description: Targets devices with a supported hover input mechanism.

item.title: @media (pointer: fine) { ... }
item.description: Targets devices with an accurate pointing device input mechanism.

item.title: location.reload(true)
item.description: Forces reloading the current page from the server.

item.title: window.onpopstate = () => {}
item.description: Sets EventHandler for processing popstate events on the window.

item.title: window.history.pushState({ state: 1 }, 'My state', '#myHash')
item.description: Adds a state to the browsers history.

item.title: str_replace('$', '€', $str)
item.description: Replaces all targeted symbols with the replacement symbol.

item.title: const greeting = `Hello ${myVar}!`
item.description: Interpolates string with the variable.

item.title: column-count: 2
item.description: Breaks the content into columns.

item.title: break-inside: avoid-column
item.description: Prevents the content to break to a new column.

item.title: get_the_terms($post_id, 'taxonomy')
item.description: Returns all terms of the taxonomy for the given post.

item.title: get_term_by('term_taxonomy_id', $post_id)
item.description: Returns all terms by “Term” field and data.

item.title: text.trim()
item.description: Removes whitespace from string.

item.title: strtoupper($text)
item.description: Converts a string to uppercase.

item.title: strtolower($text)
item.description: Converts a string to lowercase.

item.title: get_template_directory()
item.description: Returns directory of the current theme.

item.title: in_category('Blog')
item.description: Returns true if the current post is in the category.

item.title: wp_list_pluck($menu, 'object_id')
item.description: Plucks a particular field from each object in a list.

item.title: string.replace(/$/g, '')
item.description: Removes all $ (dollar) characters from the string.

item.title: exec(`ruby script.rb`, function (err, stdout, stderr) {})
item.description: Executes shell command and buffers the output.

item.title: $myElem.classList.contains('my-class')
item.description: Checks if an element contains a class.

item.title: $parent.contains($child)
item.description: Checks if an element contains a child node.

item.title: articles.some(article => article.published)
item.description: Returns true or false if at least one element in the array passes the test.

item.title: articles.every(article => article.published)
item.description: Returns true or false if all elements in the array pass the test.

item.title: new Promise(resolve => resolve()})
item.description: Creates a new promise that represents the eventual completion (or failure) of an asynchronous operation, and its resulting value.

item.title: text-decoration-thickness: .125em
item.description: Sets text decoration thickness.

item.title: text-decoration: wavy overline Salmon;
item.description: Sets wavy text decoration over the text.

item.title: background: Salmon content-box
item.description: Sets background to content-box of an element.

item.title: min-height: 100vh
item.description: Sets the minimum height to 100% of the height of the viewport.

item.title: let apples = shoppingList.removeLast()
item.description: Removes the final item from an array.

item.title: new Date()
item.description: Creates current date object.

item.title: lines.find(line => new Date(line.date) <= new Date())
item.description: Finds and returns first match in an array.

item.title: JSON.stringify({ item: "value" })
item.description: Converts JS object or value to a JSON string.

item.title: fs.existsSync(path)
item.description: Checks if file exists.

item.title: const myClass = isHome() ? 'home' : 'category'
item.description: Ternary operator.

item.title: pointer-events: none
item.description: Removes clickable context.

item.title: <wbr/>
item.description: Sets desired word break position.

item.title: var_dump( $variable )
item.description: Dumps variable.

item.title: border-color: currentColor
item.description: Uses current text color as border color.

item.title: event.preventDefault()
item.description: Prevents default action.

item.title: add_shortcode( 'card' , 'generate_card' )
item.description: Adds shortcode tag hook.
Universal adjacent sibling combinator aka Lobotomized Owl.

item.title: const { src, dest, series, or parallel } = require('gulp')
item.description: Deconstructs object.

item.title: setcookie('myCookie', time() - 3600);
item.description: Deletes cookie.

item.title: br { content: ' ' }
item.description: Prevents line break.

item.title: position: sticky
item.description: Makes element sticky.

item.title: configs.map(config => config.path)
item.description: Creates an array with returned paths.

item.title: background-repeat: round
item.description: Tiles background image.

item.title: -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale
item.description: Fixes font smoothness on MacOS.

item.title: wp_reset_postdata( )
item.description: Reset context for WordPress query.

item.title: overflow: initial
item.description: Sets overflow to default state.

item.title: all: unset
item.description: Resets all properties to default.
